title: rune masteries and items
body: I could not visit rune and mastery pages from the box itself. I could not save item to be used on game.

replies.body: Are you on the updated client?  Issues selecting runes or masteries can be due to third party programs.  As a first step, remove any third party apps you might have running.  Let me know if that helps!

I just uninstalled and reinstalled LOL. Was the third party the one called LEAGUE CLIENT UPDATE OPEN BETA? I guess that was the upgrade version where I could no be able to visit into the masteries and item set to be saved and used on the actual game.

Open beta should be the updated client, so it's fine.  We'd like to look into this further to see why those pages aren't responding for you.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look.  Make sure to clarify which version of the client you're on to prevent confusion in the ticket.  We'll reply back asap!

In my new installed version there's no item set to visit unlike the older version where we can save item. This is what the new version what I have, under the collection tab there is: Champion--Runes--Masteries--Spells. (there's no Item set like the older version have)
i dont know if im using third party program. If im using third party program how can i remove it?
i dont know if im using third party program. If im using third party program how can i remove it?
